description: T.1 Yew - 3m Holistic crown reduction to previous pruning points at 8m Height and 5m Width.T.2 Holly - 3m Holistic crown reduction to 8m Height and 4m Width.T.3 Yew - 3m Holistic crown reduction to 8m Height and 4m Width.T.4 Chestnut - 3m Holistic crown reduction to 8m Height and 4m Width.T.5 Apple Tree - 2-3m Lateral reduction from adjacent buildings & shape.G.1 Row of Lime - Repollard to previous points at 10m Height and 7m Width establishing 2m clearance from adjacent buildings.T.6 Silver Birch - Crown reduction to most recent points at 15m Height and 12m Width.T.7 Holly - Crown reduction to most recent points at 8m Height and 3m Width.T.8 Sycamore - Crown reduction to most recent points at 7m Height and 7m Width.All cuts being made to suitable growth points and trees being left sympathetically well shaped and balanced.
